meanings.definition: To feed (a person or animal) to excess.
meanings.sent1: She overfeeds her cat with too many treats.
meanings.sent2: The farmer overfeeds his chickens to ensure they grow big and healthy.
meanings.sent3: The dog overfeeds on table scraps and then naps all day.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing bird feeder overfeeds the visiting sparrows.
meanings.sent5: Overfeeding can lead to health problems for pets and humans alike.

meanings.definition: To supply with an excessive amount of food.
meanings.sent1: The buffet overfeeds its customers with a wide variety of dishes.
meanings.sent2: The generous host overfeeds her guests with delicious homemade meals.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine overfeeds snacks to hungry students between classes.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing cornucopia overfeeds the mythical creatures in the painting.
meanings.sent5: Overfeeding at the party left everyone feeling uncomfortably full.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume more than necessary.
meanings.sent1: He overfeeds on sweets and then regrets it later.
meanings.sent2: The child overfeeds on candy at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon overfeeds on garbage cans in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The voracious reader overfeeds on books during the summer break.
meanings.sent5: Overfeeding on junk food can lead to feeling unwell.
